name: Class JPasswordField.AccessibleJPasswordField
text:
This class implements accessibility support for the
 JPasswordField class.  It provides an implementation of the
 Java Accessibility API appropriate to password field user-interface
 elements.
 
Warning:
 Serialized objects of this class will not be compatible with
 future Swing releases. The current serialization support is
 appropriate for short term storage or RMI between applications running
 the same version of Swing.  As of 1.4, support for long term storage
 of all JavaBeans™
 has been added to the java.beans package.
 Please see XMLEncoder.

methods.description: Gets the role of this object.

Gets the AccessibleText for the JPasswordField.
 The returned object also implements the
 AccessibleExtendedText interface.

methods.method_sig:
public String getAtIndex (int part,
                         int index)
methods.description: Returns the String at a given index.

methods.method_sig:
public String getAfterIndex (int part,
                            int index)
methods.description: Returns the String after a given index.

methods.method_sig:
public String getBeforeIndex (int part,
                             int index)
methods.description: Returns the String before a given index.

methods.method_sig:
public String getTextRange (int startIndex,
                           int endIndex)
methods.description: Returns the text between two indices.

methods.method_sig:
public AccessibleTextSequence getTextSequenceAt (int part,
                                                int index)
methods.description:
Returns the AccessibleTextSequence at a given
 index.

methods.method_sig:
public AccessibleTextSequence getTextSequenceAfter (int part,
                                                   int index)
methods.description:
Returns the AccessibleTextSequence after a given

methods.method_sig:
public AccessibleTextSequence getTextSequenceBefore (int part,
                                                    int index)
methods.description:
Returns the AccessibleTextSequence before a given
